thread.title: Michelle Keegan and husband Mark Wright keep it in the family as they enjoy double date night - Mirror Online
thread.title_full: Michelle Keegan and husband Mark Wright keep it in the family as they enjoy double date night - Mirror Online

author: Vicki Newman
title: Michelle Keegan and husband Mark Wright keep it in the family as they enjoy double date night - Mirror Online
text:
Michelle Keegan and husband Mark Wright keep it in the family as they enjoy double date night The couple headed out with Mark's brother and his partner Share Mark and Michelle invited the family along for a double date Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Marchelle are growing in numbers after inviting the family along for a double date night. 
Mark Wright and wife Michelle Keegan headed out to Alec's Restaurant in Brentwood, Essex, with Mark's brother Josh and his girlfriend Hollie Kane on Wednesday night. 
Michelle wrapped up warm in a pair of skinny black jeans and with T-shirt with a long black coat with a fur-trim collar, while Hollie braved the cold with an off-the-shoulder gypsy blouse with a pink skirt and thick belt wrapped around her waist. Read More Michelle Keegan kisses husband Mark Wright on romantic date night after worry over Love Island ex Michelle linked arms with Hollie as they left the restaurant (Photo: FameFlynet UK Tel : +44 (0)20 3551 5049 Email : info@fameflynet.uk.com) 
Michelle and Hollie seemed to be getting on like a house on fire as they linked arms as they walked to the car after leaving the restaurant. 
The foursome, who took time to pose for pictures as they left, smiled and laughed together at something on Mark's phone and were in very good spirits. 
The boys were dressed casually but smart, with Mark wearing a pair of dark jeans and white T-shirt (matching the Mrs), with a pair of white trainers and a long dark coat. Mark shows the girls something funny on his phone (Photo: FameFlynet UK Tel : +44 (0)20 3551 5049 Email : info@fameflynet.uk.com) 
Josh also opted for jeans and a T-shirt but with a beige shirt over the top. 
They were all smile as they posed up together for photographers and looked as if they'd all had a good time in each other's company. 
Meanwhile, Michelle is apparently concerned her past may be about to become public knowledge. 
Brad Howard, 29, who dated the former Corrie star for two years before they split back in 2010, has signed up to take part in Love Island 's latest series. Read More Michelle Keegan gives us a preview of her new Lipsy fashion collection as she poses behind a heart on Valentine's Day The foursome posed for pictures before heading home (Photo: FameFlynet UK Tel : +44 (0)20 3551 5049 Email : info@fameflynet.uk.com) 
While the pair split amicably, insiders are claiming that Michelle's hubby is fuming at the thought of his wife being embarrassed on national television. 
"Mark's very protective of Michelle, so he's seeing red. He says, if Brad blabs one thing out of line, he'll have to meet him in person," a source told Closer. 
"The relationship was years ago and Michelle says she has nothing to hide. However, she has already said she won't be watching Love Island if Brad is on it, as she thinks he could just be fame hungry." Like us on Facebook
